name: Invader Protectors
description:
Defend your towers against friends, with friends, or by yourself using your weapon and two types of towers. Every wave, the enemies get faster and stronger, but they also give bigger rewards. Are you up to the challenge?

You and a friend can play with or against each other online. Defend a tower together, or take down their towers while defending your own.

It is best played with a controller, but check the README file for alternative controls.
